additional_comments: inconsistency between notification times and the beep ordering by the authors; contains multiple sampling frequencies; hostile item is coded as "I feel stupid" in the data

features.name: reminder
features.coding:
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: session_instance_response_lapse
features.coding: Response lapse in minutes:second

features.name: session_length
features.coding: Session length in minutes:seconds

features.name: morning_sleep
features.coding:
Good morning. Did you sleep well last night?
1 = Not at all
5 = Yes, absolutely

features.name: morning_breakfast
features.coding:
Have you eaten (or will you eat) breakfast this morning? (Recoded)
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: morning_ok
features.coding:
Do you feel okay about going to school today?
1 = No, not at all
5 = Yes, absolutely

features.name: enjoy_all
features.coding:
How do you feel right now?: I enjoy being at school
1 = No, not at all
5 = Yes, absolutely

5 = Yes, absolutely

5 = Yes, absolutely

5 = Yes, absolutely

5 = Yes, absolutely

5 = Yes, absolutely
